FuncDef:
The ptp-adaptive enable command enables 1588 ACR/ATR on the Router.
The undo ptp-adaptive enable command disables 1588 ACR/ATR from the Router.
By default, the Router is not enabled with 1588 ACR/ATR.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
1588 ACR/ATR, which is an adaptive clock/time recovery technology, allows a 1588 ACR/ATR client (Router) to exchange 1588v2 packets with a clock server on a link where a 1588v2-incapable device resides. After receiving 1588v2 packets, the client uses clock information carried in the packets to restore clock information.
Configuration Impact
1588 ACR/ATR and 1588v2 are mutually exclusive. Before the 1588 ACR/ATR is enabled, the 1588v2 must be disabled. After the 1588 ACR/ATR is enabled, the 1588v2 functions no long take effect.
Follow-up Procedure
Unicast negotiation has been enabled and its parameters have been set on a clock server and a client.
Precautions
This command is supported only on the admin VS.
The ptp-adaptive enable command needs to be run on both a clock server and a client before they perform 1588 ACR/ATR clock/time synchronization.
Oven controlled crystal oscillator does not support ACR.
